title: rune pages?
body: where do you buy rune pages in the store... i cant find them anywhere.

replies.body: You may have to change the dropdown that says "Tier 3" to "Show all".

Yeah i did and it fixed it

Feel like a bit of an idiot now

If it makes you feel any better, someone else asked that on boards, I went looking for a good 10 minutes, couldn't find it, asked someone who then looked for about a minute, found it and then told me, and then I proceeded to feel like a moron.
Don't worry I can guarantee you we've all been there...

> [{quoted}](name=Fitzky,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=4bgnQfgn,comment-id=0001000000000001,timestamp=2016-11-15T11:50:50.518+0000)
>
> Don't worry I can guarantee you we've all been there...

What about this T_T? http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/HNiuEQ16-man-in-the-middle-atkbreach-and-riot-support-hasnt-replied-for-2days-or-theyre-still-fixing-it

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/9gNYxGh5qNU/maxresdefault.jpg Go to the runes category or click every tab and check the list on the left side, otherwise report it as a bug to Riot support if you can't see it still.
found out what was wrong after i spent all the rp...... r.i.p
